title: "Datasaurus"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(datasauRus)
```

# Exploratory Analysis

```{r numerical summaries}
datasaurus_dozen %>% 
  group_by(dataset) %>% 
  summarise(mean_x = mean(x),
            var_x  = var(x),
            mean_y = mean(y),
            var_y  = var(y),
            cor_xy = cor(x,y))
```

# Plot

```{r plot, fig.height=10}
datasaurus_dozen %>% 
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~dataset, ncol = 3)
```
